"Destroy the Corrupter Controller":
"Find and destroy the device controlling the
corrupted fighter planes!"

"Find and destroy the device controlling the
corrupted fighter planes!"
"侵食戦闘機の制御機構を破壊"

"ダーカーに侵食された戦闘機の
制御機構を見つけだし、破壊せよ！"

"ダーカーに侵食された戦闘機の
制御機構を見つけだし、破壊せよ！"

"What's this...? D-arker readings?!
They've... corrupted our ARKS
fighter planes!"

"We've detected an abnormal D-arker reading.
It's trying to leave the area! Quick, don't
let it get away!"

"The controller has been destroyed. The
corrupted aircraft's readings have also
disappeared. The situation is under control."

"/face6 Our readings indicate the corrupted
aircraft has left the area. Pursuit is impossible
at this point, so go back to your regular duties."

"An ARKS fighter plane...?
Wait, something feels off! Be careful."

"Looks like you've shot it down… but there's
no way it's over yet. Don't let your guard
down."

"Blast, I knew it! Just how many are we
gonna have to deal with?"

"Just attacking it isn't gonna get us anywhere.
There must be a controlling mechanism of some
sort somewhere. Find it and take it out."

"We've confirmed the location of the controller.
Hurry to $(0) and take it out."

"The controller is located at $(0).
Move, move, move!"

"That's the controller there.
Destroy it quickly!"

"There, just like that! Keep it up and
take it out in one fell swoop."

"The target is almost out of range. If it gets
away, it'll just cause more damage elsewhere.
Take that controller out ASAP!"

"Mayday, mayday! There's no time!
Target is moments from leaving the area.
Find that controller and destroy it!"

"これは……ダーカーの反応！？
奴らめ、アークスの戦闘機を
乗っ取ったというのか！"

"異常なダーカー反応を検知。
ほかの戦域に転移しようとしている！
決して逃がすな！"

"制御機構の破壊を確認。
侵食戦闘機の反応も消失した。
状況終了だ。"

"/face6 侵食戦闘機の転移を確認。
追跡は不可能だろう。
本来の任務を継続しろ。"

"アークスの戦闘機だと？
……様子がおかしい、気をつけろ。"

"撃墜したようだが……。
気を抜くな、終わりじゃないぞ。"
"やはり、何機でも現れるか……"

"そいつを攻撃しても無駄だ。
どこかに制御機構がある。
見つけ出して破壊しろ。"

"制御機構の位置を特定した。
$(0)へ急行し、破壊しろ。"

"制御機構の位置は$(0)だ。
急行し、破壊しろ。"

"そいつが制御機構だ。
迅速に破壊しろ。"

"よし、そのまま攻撃を加え、
一気に破壊しろ。"

"目標の転移までの時間が迫っている。
そいつを逃がすと被害が広がる！
可及的速やかに破壊しろ！"

"目標の転移まで時間がない。
急ぎ制御機構を破壊しろ！"
